title: Best ever chilli con carne
ingredients: ['olive oil as needed', '2 onions, roughly chopped', '500g beef mince', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 sachet tomato soup powder', '1 tin chopped tomatoes', '1 tin kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '100ml chilli sauce', '1 tablespoon Encona® Hot Pepper Sauce', 'a few drops Tabasco® sauce', 'salt and pepper', 'grated Cheddar cheese', '8 pitta breads, halved (to make to open pockets)']
